attributes.action: Replace Jacqie Smith as home secretary and allow Michael Savage into the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jacqie Smith's competance has home secretary and blatant sponging of taxpayers including claims for pornographic films make her unfit for office and she should be replaced by a straight talking tough on crime person who will allow Michael Savage into the UK to uphold the freedom of speech she has decimated with here anti terrorism policies

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
